title: How to Get the Mega Man Outfit in Dead Rising

steps.headline: Go to Movie Land and look inside.
steps.description: There is the Mega Man helmets and the fake Mega Busters.

steps.headline: To get the real Mega Buster, kill 53594 zombies in 72 hour mode (this also unlocks an achievement).
To get Mega Boots, start a new game on overtime mode and avoid being captured by special forces.
To get the torso, kill 10 psychopaths.

text: Go to Movie Land and look inside. There is the Mega Man helmets and the fake Mega Busters. To get the real Mega Buster, kill 53594 zombies in 72 hour mode (this also unlocks an achievement).  To get Mega Boots, start a new game on overtime mode and avoid being captured by special forces.  To get the torso, kill 10 psychopaths.
